forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow this morning will give way to lingering snow showers this afternoon. Thunder possible. High 2C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow this morning will transition to snow showers this afternoon. Thunder possible. High 36F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 80%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. A few flurries or snow showers possible. Low -6C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies this evening will become partly cloudy after midnight. A few flurries or snow showers possible. Low 21F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. A few flurries or snow showers possible. High near -5C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. A few flurries or snow showers possible. High 24F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low around -10C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low around 15F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny. High -7C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny. High around 20F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low -12C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 11F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High -7C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High around 20F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Flurries and a few snow showers throughout the night. Low -11C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 30%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Scattered flurries and snow showers. Low 12F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 30%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High around -5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 22F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low -11C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 12F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning followed by periods of snow showers later in the day. High -4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning followed by periods of snow showers later in the day. High 24F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early with a chance of lingering snow showers later. Low -9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers early becoming more scattered later. Low 16F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 27F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. Low -6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. Low 22F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of snow. High 32F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow. Low 28F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Snow during the morning will mix with and change to rain during the afternoon. High 37F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.
